      • isCheckpoint

        public boolean isCheckpoint()

        If this return true you must saveImage your current state. The TransformDifference values will be at the start values. (xDiff = 0, yDiff = 0; angleDiff = 0; distanceDiff, scale = 1;)

        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@39086381: true if this is a checkpoint event.
        See Also:
        #getTransformDifference()

      • getActionMasked

        public int getActionMasked()

        Return the kind of action being performed. Consider using ly.img.android.pesdk.utils.TransformedMotionEvent$getActionMasked() and MotionEvent#getActionIndex to retrieve the separate masked action and pointer index.

        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@730ca4a7: The action, such as MotionEvent#ACTION_DOWN or the combination of MotionEvent#ACTION_POINTER_DOWN with a shifted pointer index.
        See Also:
        ly.img.android.pesdk.utils.TransformedMotionEvent$getActionMasked()
